fields.description: the {{o.a.h.fs.Hdfs}} is used by the {{FileContext}} API. It should belong to the hadoop-hdfs-client module.

comments.body: Marking this as a blocker of 2.8.0 as it prevents downstream clients that uses the {{FileContext}} API to directly depend on the {{hadoop-hdfs-client}} module.
Attaching patch for moving all AbstractFileSystem impls
